segments.text: Ugh, that sink is gushing water all over— what a disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading across the floor is filthy and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets looks like it's ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, pawing into the cookie jar with dirty hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and who knows what's on that counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably tracking crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen feels unclean with this unnoticed disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't distract from this sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes while ignoring the flood—it's just irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies scattered if they fall? That would be a sticky nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet already; this is revolting!
segments.speaker: PAR
